About me

Hello! I'm Vaidik Vadhavana, a Master's student in Computer Science at USC. My passion lies in AI, machine learning, and backend development.

When I'm not coding, I love capturing moments through photography, explore art and music, or go trekking outdoors. I enjoy meeting new people and learning from their stories, which enriches my perspective.

I'm excited about the collaborations and opportunities that lie ahead!

Projects

APSIT Community

Developed a full-stack social media platform for our college promoting Student Collaboration and Engagement.

Created APIs for core functionalities like post creation and moderation, integrated content detection for safety, and also built an internship scraper.

See Live Source Code

NutriLytik for Diabetic Patients

Developed a personalized diet recommendation system for diabetic patients using Flask and Gradient Boosting Regressor, achieving 88% accuracy in meal suggestions.

Engineered features such as OCR for quickly tracking all outdoor bought food packets by scanning their nutrition labels.

Conducted a survey of 170 diabetic patients to refine recommendation algorithms based on real-world dietary patterns.

This project strengthened my skills in machine learning, API development, and data preprocessing for health-related applications.

Source Code

Hire Me: Resume Sorter

A a versatile resume sorting application made using Python and tkinter GUI that leverages natural language processing (NLP) techniques to efficiently categorize resumes based on their domains.
